name: Ballboi Early Prototype Version
description:
This is the Ballboi Prototype. 

Basically, you play as that Ball and have to get to the Goal.

As the Title suggests, this is an early Prototype with very few levels and stupidly bad graphics and I wanted to collect some Feedback on it. Mostly so I know if I should continue working on it or not.

I already have some more features working properly, but I didnt manage to make a level with them yet. These include:

-Door with Pressureplates, that can only be activated by the Player or some Object in the Scene
-Bounce Pads, which can bounce you up a certain height (Their earliest Version can be seen in the "Main Menu" but I improved them by now)
-Another one I cant think of right now

Feedback dependent, I may continue developing the game, especially by improving graphics, adding way more levels, adding more mechanics and actually use these mechanics. I will also take suggestions by the players into consideration if they seem good and doable for me.

Disclaimer: This is my first "Real Game" so please dont be toxic or something like that, I'm still learning.
